Package org.sensorhub.api.database

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDatabase
    Base interface for all database implementations.
    A database contains one or more data stores.
    IDatabaseModuleDescriptor
    Extension of IModuleProvider allowing a storage module to advertise itself as read-only.
    IDatabaseRegistry
    Interface for the main database registry on a sensor hub.
    IFeatureDatabase
    Common interface for feature databases
    IObsSystemDatabase
    Main interface for databases used to store data related to one or more observing systems.
    IObsSystemDatabaseModule<ConfigType extends DatabaseConfig>  
    IObsSystemDbAutoPurgePolicy
    Interface for policies used to automatically purge historical data.
    The criteria used for purging is up to the implementation (e.g.
    ISystemStateDatabase
    Interface for databases maintaining the latest state of systems connected to the hub.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseConfig
    Base config class for all database modules
